kw.name: Open to website
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Opens the browser and navigates to the specified website URL, then maximizes the browser window.

kw.name: Given Login to website
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Logs into the website by entering the username and password, then clicking the login button.

kw.name: Then Verify new page URL after login success
Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.
Verifies that the current URL after a successful login matches the expected URL.

kw.name: And Verify new page contains expected text after login success
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'successfully logged in'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: expected 'successfully logged in' text is shown
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Neither 'Congratulations' nor 'successfully logged in' was found.
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
Verifies the presence of either 'Congratulations' or 'successfully logged in' text on the page after login.

kw.name: When Logout from website
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Logs out of the website by clicking the logout button after ensuring it is enabled.

kw.name: Then Verify new page URL after logout
Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.
Verifies that the current URL after logging out matches the expected login page URL.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Open to website
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Opens the browser and navigates to the specified website URL, then maximizes the browser window.

kw.name: Input Text

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Logs into the website by entering the username and password, then clicking the login button.

kw.name: Then Verify error message text when username incorrect
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Your username is invalid!'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Verifies the error message shown when an invalid username is entered.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
